data.title: Ontario Racquet Club
data.meta_description: Game. Set. Match. Daniel Nestor Event, promo code for ORC Members
data.text:
About this event!

Daniel Nestor has announced that he will be retiring this fall after Rogers Cup. His accomplishments and contributions to Canadian tennis have been extraordinary, including 91 titles, over 1000 wins, a gold medal and a plethora of Grand Slam titles - truly worthy of a celebration!

On the first Sunday of Rogers Cup, August 5, we will do just that at the Game. Set. Match. Daniel Nestor presented by Sandeep Lal and Tennis Fans like You gala fundraising event!

The event will be a world-class show presented in two parts at the prestigious Roy Thomson Hall in Toronto – a star-studded, hilarious roast of Daniel followed by an emotional induction into the Canadian Tennis Hall of Fame.

Daniel’s good friends Andy Murray, the Bryan Brothers, John Isner, Milos Raonic, Vasek Pospisil and Denis Shapovalov have all been confirmed as roasters.

Join Us

It’s going to be a very special evening with close to 2000 people in attendance. Proceeds from the event will be used to create a special award in Daniel’s name to support the next generation of high performance Canadian players from coast to coast, ensuring his legacy for decades to come.

Tickets range from $50 to $200, but as a TPA Member you have priority access to tickets now and will also receive a 10% discount by using the promo code: TPAMEMBER.

If you are interested, go to the Event Page on the Roy Thomson Hall Website, click on the line under the Buy Tickets button that says “Have a promo code? Enter it here” and enter TPAMEMBER.

We hope you will join us at this once-in-a-lifetime event where we can thank Daniel for all he has done for Canadian tennis and Canadian sport.
